title: Crime Alert 06.27.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.27.19
description:
Charges brought against man in the death of a family of four. Man charged in the death of a grandfather playing Pokemon Go. Fake Uber driver found with unconscious woman in the backseat.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
